contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 13, 1927 D Sheffield Contest
Sheffield Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
sheffield-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Weston Park, Sheffield March contest - 1st B Winning, 2nd Grimethorpe, 3rd Worksop. Contest promoted by Sheffield Corporation and restricted to Sheffield Bands - part of 1st prize was a future engagement in Weston Park. 8 bands competed.
Sept. 23, 2013, 8:08 p.m. March 16, 2018, 4:33 p.m.
1 B Winning and Blackwell Colliery T. F. Ward Il Flauto Magico [unknown arranger]
2 Rotherham Borough Charles John Elsom Rossini's Works
3 Worksop Miners Welfare Band Clyde Pressley Gounod [arr. W. Rimmer]
4 Grimesthorpe George H. Mercer Le Prophete [unknown arranger]
5 Stocksbridge Old Prize Joe Travis Giralda [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Attercliffe Institute Unknown Echoes of the Opera
Unknown Result Holmes Mills Rotherham I. Patterson Oberon [arr. Round]
Unknown Result Mount Gerezim 55th Co B.B. Unknown A Garland of Classics
